short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stylize your scroll bar from a handful of presets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that customizes your scroll bar to either a black or white one. Works on all websites and can be changed on the fly into black or white. Check out the style of the scroll bar above
